property.name: Text
property.value: Cannot have restricted attachments. Action: Deal 2 damage to Quickbeam to ready him. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reduce the cost to play Halfast Gamgee by 1 for each side quest in the victory display. Response: After Halfast Gamgee enters play, add 1 resource to a hero’s resource pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Discard an ally you control to choose and discard a Condition attachment.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Beorning Guardian participates in an attack that destroys an enemy, discard Beorning Guardian to place X progress on a location, where X is the destroyed enemy’s printed $.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Condition. Trap.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play into your play area unattached. If unattached, attach to the next eligible enemy that engages you. While attached enemy is engaged with you, reduce the total $ of the staging area by X, where X is attached enemy’s printed $.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if you control a Noldor or Silvan hero. Planning Action: Shuffle a set aside Wind from the Sea into the encounter deck. Then, remove Flight to the Sea from the game.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Gondor. Ranger.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Emyn Arnen Ranger commits to quest, choose an enemy with a Trap attachment. Until the end of the phase, Emyn Arnen Ranger gets +X Ò, where X is the chosen enemy’s printed $.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if you control a unique character with the Ent trait and another unique character with the Hobbit trait. Action: Ready each damaged Ent character you control.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Artifact. Item. Ring.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a hero. Limit 1 per hero and 1 per deck. Action: Exhaust Magic Ring and raise your threat by 1 to (choose one): heal 1 damage from attached hero, add 1 resource to attached hero’s pool, or ready attached hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Ready each hero committed to the quest and remove Wind from the Sea from the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Crossings of Poros

property.name: Type
property.value: Objective Ally

property.name: Text
property.value: The last player gains control of Poros Garrison. Immune to player card effects. You can optionally engage an additional enemy during the encounter phase. If Poros Garrison leaves play, the players lose the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Crossings of Poros

property.name: Text
property.value: Cannot leave the staging area or take damage. X is the stage number of the main quest. The Black Serpent gets +X $, +X Û and +X Ú. Forced: At the end of the encounter phase, either remove X progress from the main quest, or The Black Serpent makes an immediate attack against the first player.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Crossings of Poros

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Southron Outrider engages you, either place a random enemy from the Harad Soldiers set in the encounter discard pile, or Southron Outrider gets +3 Û this round.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Exhaust a character you control.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Crossings of Poros

property.name: Traits
property.value: Orc. Uruk.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Either place a random enemy from the set aside Mordor Orcs set in the encounter discard pile, or Uruk Prowler makes an immediate attack against the first player.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Discard a random card from your hand.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Crossings of Poros

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Either place a random enemy from the set aside Desert Creatures set in the encounter discard pile, or Desert Warg gains surge.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy makes an additional attack after this one.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Crossings of Poros

property.name: Traits
property.value: Desert. Hills.

property.name: Text
property.value: X is the highest number of characters controlled by a single player. Forced: After Desolate Land becomes the active location, choose 1 random card from the set aside encounter set with the most cards remaining. Reveal that card as if it was part of the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Crossings of Poros

property.name: Traits
property.value: Desert. Hills.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Harondor Waste becomes the active location, choose 1 random card from the set aside encounter set with the most cards remaining and place it in the encounter discard pile. Then, shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Return attacking enemy to the staging area after this attack.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Crossings of Poros

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Doomed 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Choose 1 random card from the set aside encounter set with the most cards remaining. Reveal that card as if it was the top card of the encounter deck.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, resolve the ‘when revealed’ effect on this card.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Mountains of Shadow

property.name: Text
property.value: While Foothills of Mordor is in the staging area, ‘when revealed’ effects cannot be canceled. Forced: After Foothills of Mordor becomes the active location, raise each player’s threat by 2.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Mountains of Shadow

property.name: Text
property.value: While any player has threat of 35 or higher, Shadowy Vale gets +3 $. Forced: After Shadowy Vale becomes the active location, reveal the top card of the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Mountains of Shadow

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Raise each player’s threat by X, where X is the printed quest points of the active location. If there is no active location, Mountains of Shadow gains surge.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, raise your threat by 2.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Mountains of Shadow

property.name: Type
property.value: Side Quest

property.name: Text
property.value: The path through the hills has led you too far up and now you walk along exposed heights where there’s nowhere to hide. You need to find a way down. Surge. Each player’s threat cannot be reduced. Response: When Find a Way Down is defeated, each player reduces his threat by 3.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Crossings of Poros

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Set Poros Garrison and each of the following encounter sets aside, out of play: Mountains of Shadow, Desert Sands, Desert Creatures, Harad Soldiers, and Mordor Orcs. The first player adds The Black Serpent to the staging area and shuffles the encounter deck. Each other player reveals an encounter card.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Crossings of Poros

property.name: Text
property.value: Allies enter play exhausted. Forced: At the end of the planning phase, advance to a random stage 2.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Crossings of Poros

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Shuffle the Desert Sands encounter set into the encounter deck. Remove the Mountains of Shadow encounter set and the other stage 2A from the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Crossings of Poros

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After a player plays an ally, he must either exhaust that ally or deal 1 damage to it. Forced: When this stage is defeated, advance to a random stage 3.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Crossings of Poros

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Shuffle the Mountains of Shadow encounter set into the encounter deck. Remove the Desert Sands encounter set and the other stage 2A from the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Crossings of Poros

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After a player plays an ally, he must either exhaust that ally or raise his threat by 1. Forced: When this stage is defeated, advance to a random stage 3.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Crossings of Poros

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Set each other stage 3A aside, out of play. Shuffle the encounter discard pile and the Desert Creatures encounter set into the encounter deck. Then, each player reveals an encounter card.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Crossings of Poros

property.name: Text
property.value: Enemies in the staging area cannot take damage. Forced: After an enemy engages a player, deal 1 damage to a hero that player controls.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Crossings of Poros

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Set each other stage 3A aside, out of play. Shuffle the encounter discard pile and the Harad Soldiers encounter set into the encounter deck. Then, each player reveals an encounter card.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Crossings of Poros

property.name: Text
property.value: Each enemy in the staging area gets -10 engagement cost. Forced: After an enemy engages a player, remove 1 progress from this stage.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Crossings of Poros

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Set each other stage 3A aside, out of play. Shuffle the encounter discard pile and the Mordor Orcs encounter set into the encounter deck. Then, each player reveals an encounter card.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Crossings of Poros

property.name: Text
property.value: Orc Patrols gets +2 quest point for each enemy in the staging area. Forced: After an enemy engages a player, raise that player’s threat by 1.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Crossings of Poros

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The first player takes control of Poros Garrison. Search the encounter deck and discard pile for each enemy that belongs to an encounter set denoted by the first icon on each set aside stage 3 and add them to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Crossings of Poros

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After an enemy attacks and destroys a character, remove X progress from this stage. X is the attacking enemy’s printed $. This stage cannot be defeated except at the end of the combat phase. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.
